<div class="actionToolbar_mobile toolbar_style_1 {%if template contains 'product' and settings.display_sidebar_bottom_product %}actionToolbar-product{%endif%} {%if template contains 'cart'%}actionToolbar-cart{%endif%}">
	<div class="toolbar-wrapper d-flex align-items-center justify-content-around">
		{%- if settings.sidebar_icon_home_show -%}

			</a>
		</div>
		{%- endif -%}
